org.tmotte.tmplz.load.builtin

Class URLTextLoaderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tmotte.tmplz.load.builtin.URLTextLoaderFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextLoaderFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory, ServletContextTextLoaderFactory

    public class URLTextLoaderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextLoaderFactory
    This acts as a base class for most of the other built-in TextLoaderFactory classes, and is somewhat useful on its own as well.

    • Constructor Summary

      Invokes URLTextLoaderFactory(prePath, null).
      URLTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.String prePath, java.net.Proxy proxy) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextLoader create(Path path)
      Requests a TextLoader instance; invoked by TextLoadMgr.
      URLTextLoaderFactory setBrokenZipResolution(boolean enableBrokenZipResolution)
      Used by ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory to fix Java's problems with resolving relative URL's in zip files.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • URLTextLoaderFactory

        public URLTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.String prePath,
                    java.net.Proxy proxy)
        Parameters:
        prePath - Will be prepended to Path.getPathString() when Path.hasPathString() returns true. For example, if you want to load all templates from your filesystem, you could use "file://" or "file://c:/MyTemplateDirectory".
        proxy - This will be used to invoke URL.openConnection(Proxy), so that you can open HTTP connections (and perhaps other types) via a proxy server. This parameter should be null if no proxy is needed.

      • URLTextLoaderFactory

        public URLTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.String prePath)
        Invokes URLTextLoaderFactory(prePath, null).

      • URLTextLoaderFactory

        public URLTextLoaderFactory()
        Invokes URLTextLoaderFactory("", null).

    • Method Detail

      • setBrokenZipResolution

        public URLTextLoaderFactory setBrokenZipResolution(boolean enableBrokenZipResolution)
        Used by ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory to fix Java's problems with resolving relative URL's in zip files.
        See Also:
        ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory.ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.ClassLoader,java.lang.String,boolean)

      • create

        public TextLoader create(Path path)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: TextLoaderFactory

        Requests a TextLoader instance; invoked by TextLoadMgr. TextLoadMgr will cache the TextLoader and ask it to check any Path that matches the Path it was created for (as defined by Path.equals()).

        Specified by:
        create in interface TextLoaderFactory
        Returns:
        If path.hasURL() returns true, a URLTextLoader is created with path.getURL(). If path.hasPathString() returns true, the "prePath" value passed to the constructor ("" by default) will be prepended to path.getPathString(), and new URL(String) will be invoked with it.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
